name: Chiller Run
description:
Using the ability to turn air into ice, Chiller must survive as long as he can in the incoming alien invasion. Dodge wave after wave of enemy aliens to stay alive as long as you can.

This is a one button side scrolling endless runner. Look for the headlights of the oncoming UFOs and try not to get hit! Big Jumps will give big score bonuses. Press Spacebar to move up, let gravity do the rest.
